sn46.4:4.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta was staying near Sāvatthī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
sn46.4:5.3: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.4:5.4: These are the seven awakening factors.
sn46.4:5.5: In the morning, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.
sn46.4:5.7: and in the evening, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.
sn46.4:5.8: If it’s the awakening factor of mindfulness, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.
sn46.4:5.9: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides. …
sn46.4:5.10: If it’s the awakening factor of equanimity, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.
sn46.4:5.11: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides.
sn46.4:6.1: Suppose that a ruler or their minister had a chest full of garments of different colors.
sn46.4:6.2: In the morning, they’d don whatever pair of garments they wanted.
sn46.4:6.4: and in the evening, they’d don whatever pair of garments they wanted.
sn46.4:6.5: In the same way, in the morning,
sn46.4:6.7: and in the evening, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.
sn46.4:6.8: If it’s the awakening factor of mindfulness, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.
sn46.4:6.9: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides. …
sn46.4:6.10: If it’s the awakening factor of equanimity, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.
sn46.4:6.11: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides.”
